chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:

one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
si: sorted_interface
lmi: log_matching_interface
smspi: state_machine_safety'interface
rlmli: refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface
pllsi: prevLog_leader_sublog_interface
ctgt0: current_term_gt_zero_interface

miaei: match_index_all_entries_interface
lhlli: leaders_have_leaderLogs_interface

lphogli: log_properties_hold_on_ghost_logs_interface

tci: transitive_commit_interface
tsi: term_sanity_interface
lhllsi: leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong_interface
ollpti: one_leaderLog_per_term_interface
rmri: raft_msg_refinement_interface

Goal:
forall (net : network) (h : Net.name) (e e' : entry) (t : term), msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> In e' (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e <= eIndex e' -> lifted_committed net e' t -> lifted_committed net e t

hCR_preserves_committed : forall (net net' : ghost_log_network) (h : name) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (e : entry) (t : term), handleClientRequest h (snd (nwState net h)) client id c = (out, d, l) -> (forall h' : Net.name, nwState net' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (update_elections_data_client_request h (nwState net h) client id c, d) h') -> lifted_committed net e t -> lifted_committed net' e t
leader_sublog_host_invariant = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (leader : Net.name) (e : entry) (h : Net.name), type (nwState net leader) = Leader -> In e (log (nwState net h)) -> eTerm e = currentTerm (nwState net leader) ->...-> Prop Arguments leader_sublog_host_invariant {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
log_matching_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit ->...-> Prop Arguments log_matching_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
allEntries_gt_0_invariant : forall (net : network) (h : Net.name) (e : entry), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> In e (map snd (allEntries (fst (nwState net h)))) -> eIndex e > 0
leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h : Net.name, type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader ->...-> Prop Arguments leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
entries_match_invariant : forall (net : network) (h h' : Net.name), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_match (log (snd (nwState net h))) (log (snd (nwState net h')))
directly_committed_allEntries_preserved : forall (net net' : network) (e : entry), directly_committed net e -> (forall h : Net.name, In (eTerm e, e) (allEntries (fst (nwState net h))) -> In (eTerm e, e) (allEntries (fst (nwState net' h)))) -> directly_committed net' e
lifted_prevLog_leader_sublog = fun net : network => forall (leader : Net.name) (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), type (snd (nwState net leader)) = Leader -> In p (nwPackets net) -> snd (pBody p) = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> currentTerm (snd (nwState net leader)) = prevLogTerm -> 0 < prevLogIndex -> 0 < prevLogTerm ->...-> Prop
ghost_log_entries_match_host = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (p : packet), In p (nwPackets net) -> entries_match (log (snd (nwState net h))) (fst (pBody p)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments ghost_log_entries_match_host {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
prevLog_leader_sublog = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (leader : Net.name) (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), type (nwState net leader) = Leader -> In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit ->...-> Prop Arguments prevLog_leader_sublog {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
lifted_committed_ext : forall (ps : list packet) (st st' : Net.name -> data) (t : term) (e : entry), (forall h : Net.name, st' h = st h) -> lifted_committed {| nwPackets := ps; nwState := st |} e t -> lifted_committed {| nwPackets := ps; nwState := st' |} e t
Build_sorted_interface : (forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In p (nwPackets net) -> sorted (log st')) ->...-> sorted_interface
one_leaderLog_per_term_host = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h h' : Net.name) (t : term) (ll ll' : list entry), In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> In (t, ll') (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h'))) ->...-> Prop Arguments one_leaderLog_per_term_host {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
one_leaderLog_per_term_log = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h h' : Net.name) (t : term) (ll ll' : list entry), In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> In (t, ll') (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h'))) ->...-> Prop Arguments one_leaderLog_per_term_log {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
leaders_have_leaderLogs = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h : Net.name, type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader -> exists ll : list entry, In (currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)), ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leaders_have_leaderLogs {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
handleAppendEntries_logs_sorted : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In p (nwPackets net) -> sorted (log st')
one_leaderLog_per_term = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h h' : Net.name) (t : term) (ll ll' : list entry), In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> In (t, ll') (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h'))) ->...-> Prop Arguments one_leaderLog_per_term {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
